The Collection

Sol Buttz is a collection of 888 pixelated NFT where every butt has their own story and personality.
With artworks designed one by one by the pixel artist Daneli.sol, the collection aim to become the most viral meme on Solana NFT space.

Get whitelisted

$BUTTZ Token

Built to rule the Sol Buttz DAO will be used as currency to mint the ultra-memeable Sol Buttz NFT collection.

After mint, $BUTTZ will offer multiple utilities and passive icome opportunities to an always growing community of holders.

  • Liquidity burned

    Aiming to build and enforce trust with the community and holders, all LP tokens were burnt and liquidity locked forever.

  • Mint disabled

    Thanks to mint authority disabled, $BUTTZ total supply is capped forever and any addiotnal token can be ever minted.

  • Recursive token burns

    With the purpose of dilute total supply, additional token burns are already planned and will happen recursively.

  • NFT Staking

    Through staking of your NFT token(s) you can earn rewards in $BUTTZ. All earnings will be redeemable through raffle, merchandising, future mints and many more utilites.

  • BUTTZPAY R2E

    Raid to earn program designed to maximise the power of community. Receive daily payouts in BUTTZ, Solana or USDC for your engagement with BUTTZ social contents.

  • DAO and Community

    Empowered by a growing community, BUTTZ aim to create a DAO where hundreds of contributors take decisions sharing a common vision of fairness and equality.

Trade, swap and earn $BUTTZ

$BUTTZ is listed on all major Solana DEX.
Join liquidity pool farm on Raydium for collecting more rewards, or swap and place limit order through Jupiter aggregator.
